text: Meteor-M No.2, was the second Russian Meteor-M series of polar-orbit weather satellite. It was launched on a Soyuz-2.1b rocket with a Fregat upper stage on 8 July 2014. It has a design life of 5 years. ==See also== * Meteor ==References== Category:Spacecraft launched in 2014 Category:Weather satellites of Russia Category:Spacecraft launched by Soyuz-2 rockets
title: Meteor-M No.2
